description:
Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can
reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell
slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10
for each slot level above 1st.
damage: 3d10 necrotic plus 1d10 per spell level above base
